metadata.title: CVE-2023-4540 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Handling of Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in Daurnimatorlua-http library allows Excessive Allocation and a denial of service (DoS)attack to be executed by sending a properly crafted request to the server.This issue affects lua-http: all versions before commit ddab283.

criterions.comment: lua-http package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
